page.title: 04A day of my holiday
page.content: I get up in the morning and go to my dad's room and read a story. Then I get into my clothes and go downstairs and have breakfast. I went to find Pip, my dog, and I went into the hayfield to play with Pip. Then I played with my Tonka tractor until 1 o'clock and then I had my dinner. I opened the gate for my Dad then I have a go on my tractor. I have had the tractor for about one year. I think it is German, it has an 8 hp petrol engine. Although my tractor is painted blue at the moment I shall probably change it to green because my favourite tractors, Magirus, are green. I use it mainly on our small farm, especially for breaking up the surface of the soil and getting the weeds out.
